NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Travel and Critique or the cell corresponding to Language and Localization?

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.50 to 0.75?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Art, Influence), (Cuisine, Influence), (Language, Influence), (Literature, Influence), (Music, Influence), (TV Shows, Influence), (Travel, Influence)}.
